EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Information (1316118576.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Information (1316118576.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Rick,
Thanks for your response. I’ve enclosed a brochure about the MBO Partners Security Clearance Process. In short, we take care of everything up to TS, the SCI portion (if you have it), is held at the agency.
I’ll be at the ready when something comes through. Please let me know if you have any other questions.
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Lindsay, Richard H [mailto:Rick.Lindsay@gdit.com] Sent: Thursday, September 15, 2011 2:06 PM To: Steve Arhancet Cc: rick.lindsay@att.net Subject: RE: MBO Partners Information
Steve,
Thanks again for the below information. I have been busy completing my tasks with GDIT and our customer for closeout today.
I have cc’d my new rick.lindsay@att.net e-mail address.
I have one question about Security Clearances that I don’t remember discussing during our phone call. How are they handled? Is it through MBO Partners?
Still trying to get that first customer to say I need you for …. When I do, I will then call and we will set the wheels in motion.
R, Rick Lindsay Rick.lindsay@att.net 619-890-3361
From: Steve Arhancet [mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com] Sent: Thursday, September 08, 2011 2:26 PM To: Lindsay, Richard H Cc: rick.lindsay@att.net Subject: MBO Partners Information
Rick,
It was a pleasure speaking with you. I’ve enclosed a few things as summary to our call:
Link to our benefits: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefitsLink to a summary of the value of using MBO Partners: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Welcome_to_MBO_Partners.pdfLink to the most common types of non-billable expenses you can submit to us: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_List.pdfOur Full Expense Policy: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf
I will follow up with you as a courtesy, but feel free to email or call me should you have any questions,
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
